description: AdderaCare AB engages in investing, owning, and managing companies within the assistive technology sector. The company is headquartered in Helsingborg, Skane and currently employs 78 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2016-12-01. The firm operates as a provider of various products, such as ramps, stairs, elevators, bathroom equipment for disabled people, vehicles for people with special needs, vestibular products, wheelchairs, fittings for lightweight sliding doors, sensory stimulation products, among others. In addition, it offers various sensory furniture, such as water beds, music furniture, podiums, mattresses and mirrors, among others. The firm supplies products for people with coordination difficulties to train their coordination skills. The firm operates through two subsidiaries, namely Trident Industri AB and Komikapp AB. AdderaCare is also the parent company of Amajo AS, a Norway-based provider of sensory stimulation products and toys for children and the elderly.
name: AdderaCare AB
